text: xallxhˌ thrng pen dwng prathip hæng chan fa thanghlay læa phændin xupma dwng prathip khxng phraxngkh semuxn dang chxng tam phnang thi mi takeiyng takeiyng nan xyu nı khom kæw khom kæw pen semuxn dwngdaw thi prakay sæng thuk cud cak naman khxng tnmi thi mi khwam careiy khux tn makxk man midi xyu thang tawanxxk læa midi xyu thang tawantk naman khxng man thæb prakay sæng xxk ma mæn wa fi midi pi krathb man dwng prathip sxn dwng prathip xallxhˌ thrng nathang dwy dwng prathip khxng phraxngkh kæ phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh læa xallxhˌ thrng yk xuthahrn thanghlay ni pheux mnusʹychati læa xallxhˌ pen phuthrng rxbru thuk sing
